title: Paradise Rot
author: Jenny Hval
text: A trippy strange read. I took this book with me to Leamington Spa when I went for a work trip and was locked in pretty much immediately upon starting it. I really enjoyed the outsider's perspective on Anglo culture (I thought the book was set in Australia but it seems like it was actually set in Australia! Anyway, the setting felt very familiar to me, but reading it through the eyes of Paradise Rot's protagonist, it seemed strange and other-wordly.
